# bq-toast-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The toast-item component is designed to inform the user when something happens.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                     | Type                                                                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | It defines the type of toast message to display | `"alert" \| "default" \| "error" \| "info" \| "loading" \| "success"` | `'default'` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part        | Description                                              |
| ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"base"`    | The component's wrapper that holds the icon and message. |
| `"icon"`    | The '<div>' tag element that acts as the icon container. |
| `"message"` | The '<div>' tag element that acts as message container.  |
